# Key exchange RTT
The client runs on Apple Silicon M1 and is located in Ontario, Canada. The server is AWS c7a.medium and is located in the us-west-2 region. Round trip time (RTT) is measured in microseconds.

AWS c7a.medium instance uses EPYC ??? PCU.

```

This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
```

# PKE and KEM performance on Apple Silicon M1
8-core CPU and 8-core GPU, 8GB RAM. Each routine is only tested for 100 rounds because McEliece is taking too long.

The C compiler is:

```
Apple clang version 15.0.0 (clang-1500.3.9.4)
Target: arm64-apple-darwin24.1.0
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin
```
